item.title: 中国习近平抵达越南进行为期两天的访问以加强两国关系
item.description:
Summary:
  • Xi embarks on first Vietnam trip in six years
  • China looks to boost ties with Hanoi
  • Possible deals on railways, digital infrastructure, rare earths
翻译:概括：
  • 习近平六年来首次访问越南
  • 中国希望加强与河内的关系
  • 铁路、数字基础设施、稀土等领域可能达成的交易

China's President Xi Jinping began a two-day visit to Vietnam on Tuesday to upgrade ties between the Communist countries three months after U.S. President Joe Biden travelled to Hanoi, as the major powers vie for influence in the Southeast Asian nation.翻译:在美国总统乔·拜登访问河内三个月后，中国国家主席习近平周二开始对越南进行为期两天的访问，以升级共产主义国家之间的关系，目前主要大国正在争夺在这个东南亚国家的影响力。

Making his first trip to Vietnam in six years, Xi was welcomed at Hanoi airport by Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh, and people on the route to his hotel waved flags of both countries, pictures on state media showed.翻译:习近平六年来首次访问越南，在河内机场受到越南总理范明正的欢迎，官方媒体的图片显示，前往他下榻的酒店途中，人们挥舞着两国国旗。

Despite very close ties on the economic front, the neighbours have been at odds over boundaries in the South China Sea and have a millennia-long history of conflict.翻译:尽管两国在经济方面关系非常密切，但两国在南海边界问题上一直存在分歧，并且有着数千年的冲突历史。

"Asia's future is in the hands of no one but Asians," Xi said in an opinion piece in the newspaper of the Vietnamese Communist party ahead of his visit.翻译:“亚洲的未来掌握在亚洲人的手中，”习近平在出访前在越南共产党报纸上发表的一篇评论文章中表示。

A "community with a shared future" between the two countries would have strategic significance, he added, according to the English and Vietnamese translations of his article.翻译:根据他文章的英文和越南语翻译，他补充说，两国之间的“命运共同体”将具有战略意义。

At the same time, he warned against rising "hegemonism" in the world, in an apparent reference to the United States, though he did not name it.翻译:与此同时，他对世界上日益抬头的“霸权主义”发出警告，显然是指美国，但他没有点名。

Xi's visit was also delayed because of lengthy talks over use of the phrase "common destiny", a stronger, Chinese interpretation of the phrase Beijing favours to describe ties between the two sides, officials and diplomats have said.翻译:官员和外交官表示，习近平的访问也被推迟，原因是就使用“共同命运”一词进行了长时间的谈判，这是北京方面倾向于描述两国关系的更强烈的中国解释。

Months in the planning, the visit had briefly even been considered to be scheduled ahead of Biden's trip, officials have said.翻译:官员们表示，在计划了几个月的时间里，这次访问甚至一度被认为是在拜登出访之前安排的。

However, the upgrade in ties would just be symbolic, said Le Hong Hiep, a specialist in Vietnamese strategic and political issues at Singapore's Iseas–Yusof Ishak Institute.翻译:然而，新加坡尤索夫伊萨研究所越南战略和政治问题专家黎洪协表示，两国关系的升级只是象征性的。

"Vietnam's mistrust of China runs deep, and from the Vietnamese people's viewpoint, there is little to no 'shared destiny' between the two countries, as long as China continues to claim most of the South China Sea," he said.

"DOZENS" OF DEALS

Beyond taking ties to a level Beijing may see as being above those with the United States, upgraded status would come with the signing of "dozens of co-operation documents," Vietnam's state newspaper Tuoi Tre quoted China's ambassador Xiong Bo as saying before Xi's visit.翻译:越南官方报纸《Tuoi Tre》援引中国大使熊波在习近平访问前的话说，除了将关系提升到北京可能认为高于与美国的水平之外，升级地位还将伴随着签署“数十份合作文件”。 。

Deals are expected to include Chinese investments to upgrade rail links between the neighbours, which would include grants, though the volume and terms of possible loans are not clear.翻译:预计交易将包括中国投资升级邻国之间的铁路连接，其中包括赠款，但可能贷款的数量和条款尚不清楚。

Boosting transport links would allow Vietnam to export more to China, especially farm products, while Beijing wants to further integrate the country's north with its southern supply chain networks.翻译:加强运输联系将使越南能够向中国出口更多产品，特别是农产品，而北京方面则希望进一步整合该国北部与南部的供应链网络。

Chinese firms have moved some operations to Vietnam quicker this year than before the COVID-19 pandemic, looking to be closer to Western clients there, lower risks from U.S.-China trade tension and cut exposure to China's weakened economy.翻译:今年，中国企业比 COVID-19 大流行之前更快地将部分业务转移到越南，希望更接近那里的西方客户，降低中美贸易紧张局势带来的风险，并减少对中国疲软经济的敞口。

Stronger rail networks would speed import of components from China for assembly in Vietnam, effectively expanding China's Belt and Road Initiative (BRI).翻译:更强大的铁路网络将加快从中国进口零部件并在越南组装的速度，从而有效扩大中国的“一带一路”倡议（BRI）。

In his op-ed piece, Xi called for faster co-operation on building infrastructure.翻译:习近平在专栏文章中呼吁加快基础设施建设合作。

China has pushed to include Vietnam in its Digital Silk Road, which may entail investments for new undersea optical fibre cables, the 5G network and other telecoms infrastructure.翻译:中国已推动将越南纳入其数字丝绸之路，这可能需要投资新的海底光缆、5G网络和其他电信基础设施。

Although the Hanoi metro is Vietnam's only project to have received BRI loans, it has not been labelled as such in a country where anti-Chinese sentiment is still widespread enough that such moves could be viewed as getting too close to Beijing.翻译:尽管河内地铁是越南唯一获得“一带一路”贷款的项目，但在反华情绪仍然普遍存在的国家，该项目并未被贴上“一带一路”贷款的标签，以至于此类举措可能被视为与北京走得太近。

Xi urged wider co-operation on security, connectivity, green energy and critical minerals, in a reference to the rare earths, of which China is the world's leading refiner while Vietnam has the second largest estimated reserves after its neighbour.翻译:习近平敦促在安全、互联互通、绿色能源和关键矿产方面开展更广泛的合作，其中提到了稀土，中国是世界领先的稀土精炼国，而越南的估计储量仅次于其邻国，位居第二。

Reporting by Francesco Guarascio @fraguarascio; Additional reporting by Khanh Vu and Phuong Nguyen in Hanoi and Liz Lee and Ryan Woo in Beijing; Editing by Lincoln Feast and Clarence Fernandez翻译:Francesco Guarascio@fraguarascio 报道； Khanh Vu 和 Phuong Nguyen 在河内以及 Liz Lee 和 Ryan Woo 在北京的补充报道；林肯·费斯特和克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 中国碧桂园交易后或可避免人民币债券违约 - 彭博新闻
item.description:
China's Country Garden Holdings (2007.HK) is likely to avoid its first default on yuan bonds after most holders of a local note agreed not to demand repayment this week, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:据彭博社周二援引知情人士的话报道，中国碧桂园控股公司（2007.HK）可能会避免首次人民币债券违约，因为大多数本地票据持有人本周同意不要求偿还。

item.title: 中方乐见缅甸冲突各方举行和谈 - 中国外交部
item.description:
China is happy to see parties to the Myanmar conflict hold peace talks and is willing to provide further support, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:中国外交部周二表示，中方乐见缅甸冲突各方举行和谈，愿提供进一步支持。

Representatives from Myanmar's ruling military have held talks, facilitated by China, state media reported Myanmar’s ruling military spokesperson as saying on Monday.翻译:据官方媒体报道，缅甸执政军方发言人周一表示，缅甸执政军方代表在中国的推动下举行了会谈。

It was unclear when or where the meeting took place and the spokesman did not elaborate on what was discussed.翻译:目前尚不清楚会议何时何地举行，发言人也没有详细说明讨论的内容。

"We believe that the easing of the situation in northern Myanmar is in the interests of all parties and conducive to peace and stability in the China-Myanmar border area," said foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁表示，我们认为缅北局势的缓和符合各方利益，有利于中缅边境地区的和平稳定。

"China is happy to see the parties to the conflict in northern Myanmar hold peace talks and achieve positive results, and we are ready to continue to provide support and facilitation to this end."翻译:中方乐见缅北冲突各方举行和谈并取得积极成果，愿继续为此提供支持和便利。

Myanmar's military is battling armed opponents on several fronts, in the fiercest challenge to its grip on the Southeast Asian country since it seized power from an elected government in a 2021 coup.翻译:缅甸军方正在多条战线上与武装反对派作战，这是自 2021 年政变中从民选政府手中夺取政权以来，对其对这个东南亚国家控制力的最激烈挑战。

A rebel alliance has overrun parts of northern Myanmar, including areas bordering China. The fiercest fighting has been near Myanmar's border with China in northern Shan state.翻译:叛军联盟已经占领了缅甸北部部分地区，包括与中国接壤的地区。最激烈的战斗发生在缅甸掸邦北部与中国边境附近。

China has continuously urged the conflict to end, while urging Chinese nationals to vacate areas of danger. It had also sent a government official there recently to urge Myanmar to take measures to strengthen the security and safety for Chinese institutions, personnel and of China-Myanmar co-operation projects.翻译:中国不断敦促停止冲突，同时敦促中国公民撤离危险地区。近期还派政府官员赴缅方敦促缅方采取措施，加强中方机构、人员和中缅合作项目的安全保障。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Tom Hogue and Michael Perry翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；汤姆·霍格和迈克尔·佩里编辑

item.title: 菲律宾就南海“骚扰”召见中国大使
item.description:
Summary:
  • Philippines calls China actions a 'serious escalation'
  • US, UK condemn China's ramming and water cannon damage to Philippine vessels
翻译:概括：
  • 菲律宾称中国行动“严重升级”
  • 美英谴责中国冲撞和水炮损坏菲律宾船只的行为

The Philippines' foreign ministry said on Tuesday it has summoned China's ambassador to Manila to protest "back-to-back harassments" in the South China Sea at the weekend, as longstanding geopolitical tensions continue in the strategic waterway.翻译:菲律宾外交部周二表示，已召见中国驻马尼拉大使，抗议周末在南海发生的“接连骚扰”，因为这条战略航道长期存在的地缘政治紧张局势仍在继续。

Manila has asked China to direct its vessels to cease and desist from what it said were illegal actions and dangerous manoeuvres against Philippine vessels, and stop interfering in legitimate Philippine activities, the ministry said in a statement.翻译:菲律宾外交部在一份声明中表示，马尼拉已要求中国指示其船只停止针对菲律宾船只的非法行动和危险动作，并停止干预菲律宾的合法活动。

Foreign Affairs Undersecretary Ma. Theresa Lazaro verbally delivered the protest against the Chinese manoeuvres that led to a collision, and against use of water cannons against Philippine vessels sending supplies to troops stationed in an ageing warship at the Second Thomas Shoal.翻译:外交部副部长马.特蕾莎·拉扎罗口头抗议中国的演习导致了撞船事件，并反对使用高压水枪攻击菲律宾船只，这些船只向驻扎在仁爱礁的一艘老化军舰上的部队运送物资。

"The actions of the Chinese vessels within the Philippine exclusive economic zone are illegal and violate the freedom of navigation," the ministry said.翻译:外交部表示：“中国船只在菲律宾专属经济区内的行为是非法的，侵犯了航行自由。”

It also protested China's use of water cannons against three fisheries bureau vessels on their way to send oil and groceries to fishermen near the Scarborough shoal.翻译:它还抗议中国使用高压水枪袭击三艘渔业局船只，这些船只正在向黄岩岛附近的渔民运送石油和杂货。

The Chinese embassy in Manila did not immediately respond to request for comment.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

The two neighbours traded accusations on Sunday, and the Philippines called China's actions a "serious escalation".翻译:这两个邻国周日互相指责，菲律宾称中国的行为“ 严重升级”。

China's foreign ministry protested over what it said was a collision on Sunday, but the Philippines said Chinese coastguard and maritime militia repeatedly fired water cannons at its resupply boats, causing "serious engine damage" to one, and "deliberately" ramming another.翻译:中国外交部对周日发生的相撞事件提出抗议，但菲律宾表示，中国海警和海上民兵多次向其补给船发射高压水枪，造成一艘补给船“发动机严重损坏”，并“故意”撞击另一艘补给船。

The United States, the Philippines' treaty ally, and the United Kingdom, both expressed support for the Philippines and condemned the actions of China, which claims sovereignty over almost the entire South China Sea, a conduit for more than $3 trillion of annual ship-borne commerce.翻译:菲律宾的条约盟友美国和英国都表示支持菲律宾，并谴责中国的行为。中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，南海是每年价值超过 3 万亿美元的船只的通道。承载商业。

The Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei, have competing claims. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said China's claims had no legal basis.翻译:菲律宾、越南、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和文莱都有相互竞争的主权主张。常设仲裁法院2016年表示，中国的主张没有法律依据。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales and Karen Lema; Editing by Martin Petty, Kanupriya Kapoor and翻译:尼尔·杰罗姆·莫拉莱斯和凯伦·勒马报道；编辑：Martin Petty、Kanupriya Kapoor 和

item.title: 京东创始人称公司“臃肿”，中国电子商务巨头面临压力
item.description:
The founder of JD.com (9618.HK) told staff he acknowledged the e-commerce giant was too large and inefficient and vowed to instil change, in response to a staff complaint about problems with the platform amid intensifying competition.翻译:京东（9618.HK）创始人告诉员工，他承认这家电子商务巨头规模太大且效率低下，并誓言要进行变革，以回应员工对该平台在竞争加剧的情况下出现的问题的抱怨。

Richard Liu made the comments in an internal staff forum in response to a post by an employee, local media reported. A person with knowledge of the matter confirmed the accuracy of his comments to Reuters on Tuesday.翻译:据当地媒体报道，刘强东在内部员工论坛上针对一名员工的帖子发表了上述言论。一位知情人士周二向路透社证实了他的言论的准确性。

The unidentified staff member had over the weekend posted a thousand word-long article, criticising JD for having an overly complex promotion mechanism and how its low-price strategy was being implemented haphazardly. Liu then responded, acknowledging problems and saying they were due to his "poor management".翻译:这名身份不明的工作人员上周末发表了上千字的文章，批评京东促销机制过于复杂，低价策略执行随意。刘随后做出回应，承认存在问题，并表示这是由于他的“管理不善”造成的。

"The current organisation is huge, bloated and inefficient, and it does take time to change it," Liu said in his comment, urging staff to join him in changing the company together.翻译:“现在的组织庞大、臃肿、效率低下，改变确实需要时间。”刘在评论中表示，他敦促员工和他一起改变公司。

"This is a routine exchange, and it demonstrates our management's confidence, as well as the entire team's collaboration, in addressing problems and overcoming challenges," a JD spokesperson said on Tuesday.翻译:京东发言人周二表示：“这是一次例行交流，它展示了我们管理层的信心以及整个团队在解决问题和克服挑战方面的协作。”

His post comes only a fortnight after Alibaba (9988.HK) co-founder Jack Ma similarly responded to an employee post on Alibaba's intranet exhorting the company to "reform for tomorrow and the day after tomorrow" in the face of increased competition, according to a person familiar with the matter.翻译:据报道，就在他发表上述言论的两周前，阿里巴巴（9988.HK）联合创始人马云对阿里巴巴内网上的一篇员工帖子做出了类似的回应，敦促该公司面对日益激烈的竞争，“为明天和后天而改革”。熟悉此事的人。

Alibaba did not reply to a request for comment on Ma's post.翻译:阿里巴巴没有回复对马云的帖子发表评论的请求。

JD.com and rival Alibaba have long been China's top e-commerce firms, but both have seen increasing competition this year from lower-priced rivals PDD Holding's (PDD.O) Pinduoduo and ByteDance's Douyin as wary consumers, faced with macroeconomic headwinds in China, hold tight to their purse strings.翻译:京东和竞争对手阿里巴巴长期以来一直是中国顶尖的电子商务公司，但今年，由于面对中国宏观经济的逆风，两家公司都面临着来自低价竞争对手拼多多(PDD.O)拼多多和字节跳动旗下抖音的激烈竞争。 ，紧紧抓住他们的钱包。

JD.com, which has announced a strategy focused on offering low prices to draw in customers, has seen its share price decline 50% so far this year, meanwhile PDD Holdings has seen its shares gain 75% in the same period.翻译:京东宣布了以低价吸引顾客的战略，今年以来其股价已下跌50%，而拼多多的股价同期上涨了 75%。

Alibaba Group, which is in the midst of the largest restructuring in its 24-year history, has seen its shares lose 70% of their value since a regulatory crackdown initiated in late 2020.翻译:阿里巴巴集团正处于其 24 年历史上最大规模的重组之中，自 2020 年底发起监管打击以来，其股价已下跌 70%。

Reporting by Casey Hall in Shanghai and Sophie Yu in Beijing; Editing by Brenda Goh and Kim Coghill翻译:Casey Hall上海报道和Sophie Yu北京报道；布伦达·吴 (Brenda Goh) 和金·科吉尔 (Kim Coghill) 编辑

item.title: 北京智库称儿童是中国最好的投资
item.description:
Children are the most worthy investment for China's economy to help stimulate consumption and expand domestic demand a Beijing policy institute said, after the country posted its first population drop in more than six decades last year.翻译:北京政策研究所表示，在中国去年出现六十多年来人口首次下降后，儿童是中国经济最有价值的投资，有助于刺激消费和扩大内需。

China, the world's second-largest economy, has struggled to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery and any decline in its future workforce and consumer demand could have a profound impact on its economy.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体，中国一直在努力实现疫情后的强劲复苏，未来劳动力和消费者需求的任何下降都可能对其经济产生深远影响。

"In the current Chinese economy, children are the best investment. Infrastructure investment is becoming saturated, manufacturing has overcapacity ... but investment in the number of children is not enough," said the policy paper by the Yuwa Population Research institute published on Tuesday.翻译:友和人口研究所周二发布的政策文件称，“当前中国经济中，孩子是最好的投资。基础设施投资趋于饱和，制造业产能过剩……但对孩子数量的投资还不够。” 。

The paper urged authorities to "urgently" reverse a rapid decline in the number of newborns.翻译:该报敦促当局“紧急”扭转新生儿数量迅速下降的趋势。

China's advantage will shrink in the future as the young population shrinks rapidly, while economic measures such as cutting interest rates, activating the capital market and optimising real estate regulation have not helped to bolster economic growth and the recovery remains weak, it said.翻译:报告称，未来中国的优势将缩小，因为年轻人口迅速萎缩，而降息、激活资本市场、优化房地产调控等经济措施对提振经济增长无助益，复苏依然疲软。

In order to boost the economy, the Yuwa report recommended that maternity subsidies be distributed at a national level rather than by local governments and targeted measures be implemented to reduce the large cost of childbearing and rearing.翻译:为了提振经济，友和报告建议生育补贴应由国家层面而不是地方政府来分配，并采取有针对性的措施，降低生育和抚养的巨额成本。

Local governments have announced a series of measures to help lower childcare costs in recent years but many policies翻译:近年来，地方政府出台了一系列降低托儿费用的措施，但不少政策

have not been implemented or remain on paper due to insufficient funding and lack of motivation by local governments, it said翻译:报告称，由于资金不足和地方政府缺乏动力，尚未落实或停留在纸面上。

"Nowadays people are unwilling to get married and have children ... Because the cost of childbearing is too high, the difficulty for women to balance family and work, the average fertility willingness of Chinese people is almost the lowest in the world."翻译:“现在人们不愿意结婚生子……因为生育成本太高，女性难以平衡家庭和工作，中国人的平均生育意愿几乎是全世界最低的。”

Current subsidies are still insufficient, lower than most European countries it said.翻译:目前的补贴仍然不足，低于大多数欧洲国家的水平。

China reported a drop of roughly 850,000 people for a population of 1.41175 billion in 2022, marking the first decline since 1961, the last year of China's Great Famine.翻译:中国报告称，2022年人口将达到14.1175亿，减少约85万人，这是自1961年（中国大饥荒的最后一年）以来的首次下降。

item.title: 2024年中国落后市场的投资者将采取防御策略
item.description:
Investors in Chinese stocks next year will be seeking out businesses with global reach or other insulation from an economic downturn, after three straight years of China underperforming world markets.翻译:在中国连续三年落后于世界市场之后，明年中国股票的投资者将寻找具有全球影响力或其他免受经济衰退影响的企业。

Companies in defensive sectors such as health, medical innovation and exporters in the electric vehicles supply chain and advanced manufacturing, as well as multinationals such as e-commerce firm PDD Holdings (PDD.O), will top the list.翻译:健康、医疗创新等防御性行业的公司以及电动汽车供应链和先进制造业的出口商，以及电子商务公司 PDD Holdings (PDD.O)等跨国公司将名列榜首。

That's despite sell-side analysts turning bullish on China's broader market for next year, with Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs forecasting Chinese equities to outperform the S&P 500.翻译:尽管卖方分析师转而看好明年中国更广泛的市场，摩根士丹利和高盛预测中国股市将跑赢标准普尔 500 指数。

"Since economic recovery is slower than expected, we lowered exposures which are sensitive to macro cycles," said Wang Qing, chairman at Shanghai Chongyang Investment Management.翻译:上海重阳投资管理有限公司董事长王庆表示，“由于经济复苏慢于预期，我们降低了对宏观周期敏感的风险敞口。”

Chongyang is instead buying defensive high-dividend stocks, medical innovators with global competitiveness, and advanced manufacturing backed by Beijing, Wang said, declining to list any investments by name.翻译:王表示，重阳转而购买防御性高股息股票、具有全球竞争力的医疗创新公司以及北京支持的先进制造业，但他拒绝透露任何投资的名称。

This follows China's blue chip CSI300 index (.CSI300) sinking to five-year lows and losing 12% over 2023 against a 15% gain for global stocks (.MIWD00000PUS) as the Chinese economy struggled with a property crunch and a slow recovery from COVID-19.翻译:在此之前，中国蓝筹股沪深 300 指数(.CSI300)跌至五年低点，并在 2023 年下跌 12%，而全球股市(.MIWD00000PUS)则上涨 15%，原因是中国经济因房地产紧缩和从新冠疫情中缓慢复苏而苦苦挣扎。 -19。

Hong Kong's Hang Seng (.HSI) fared even worse, sliding more than 18% to trade on a forward price-to-earnings ratio below six, against 21 for the S&P 500 (.SPX).翻译:香港恒生指数(.HSI)的表现更糟，下跌超过 18%，远期市盈率低于 6，而标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)则为 21。

Performance over the last 10 months crushed the optimism that infused the beginning of the year, with four straight months of foreign outflows in the second half of the year totalling a net 138 billion yuan ($19 billion) withdrawn from Chinese equities via the Stock Connect scheme.翻译:过去 10 个月的表现粉碎了年初的乐观情绪，下半年外资连续四个月通过沪港通计划从中国股市净撤资达 1,380 亿元人民币（合 190 亿美元） 。

"Investors (have) struggled to think what the next growth driver for China will be," said Caroline Yu Maurer, head of China and specialised Asia strategies at HSBC Asset Management.翻译:汇丰资产管理公司中国及亚洲专业策略主管卡罗琳·于毛雷尔(Caroline Yu Maurer)表示：“投资者一直在努力思考中国的下一个增长动力是什么。”

Goldman analysts target 4,200 for the CSI300 (.CSI300) by the end of 2024, up 23% from Monday's close at 3,419. Morgan Stanley forecasts the blue chip index at 3,850 at the end of next year and the Hang Seng (.HSI) - which finished Monday at 16,201 - at 18,500, up 14%.翻译:高盛分析师的目标是到 2024 年底沪深 300 指数(.CSI300) 达到4,200 点，较周一收盘价 3,419 点上涨 23%。摩根士丹利预计蓝筹股指数到明年年底将达到 3,850 点，而恒生指数(.HSI)周一收于 16,201 点，预计将上涨 14% 至 18,500 点。

In contrast, Goldman sees the S&P 500 (.SPX) up less than 2% from current levels to 4,700 by the end of next year. Morgan Stanley sees it falling to 4,500.

EXPORTERS AND MULTINATIONALS

Real estate is casting the longest shadow. The sector that once accounted for a quarter of China's economy is reeling from a series of developer failures and a crisis of confidence that fund managers want to see resolved before they commit capital.翻译:房地产业的阴影最为深远。这个曾经占中国经济四分之一的行业正因一系列开发商倒闭和信心危机而陷入困境，基金经理希望在投入资金之前解决这些问题。

Moody's slapped a downgrade warning on China's credit rating last week, in part due to the property malaise. Shares of Country Garden (2007.HK), once China's biggest private property developer and now battling to service its debt, are down 73% this year.翻译:穆迪上周对中国信用评级发出下调警告，部分原因是房地产市场低迷。碧桂园（2007.HK）曾经是中国最大的私营房地产开发商，目前正在努力偿还债务，今年其股价已下跌 73%。

The Hang Seng index of mainland developers (.HSMPI) is down 44%.翻译:内地开发商恒生指数(.HSMPI)下跌 44%。

With the property shock ricocheting through the economy and dampened consumption, Morgan Stanley estimates the number of MSCI China companies missing analyst earnings expectations in the third quarter was the most since 2018.翻译:随着房地产冲击波及经济并抑制消费，摩根士丹利估计第三季度未达到分析师盈利预期的 MSCI 中国公司数量为 2018 年以来最多。

New York hedge fund Indus Capital Partners is among several investors turning away from exposure to China's domestic demand.翻译:纽约对冲基金 Indus Capital Partners 是几家放弃投资中国内需的投资者之一。

We see value in "some exporters and multinationals, and cheap (state-owned enterprises) aligned with and otherwise not of great concern to the government," said Indus partner John Pinkel, without naming specific companies.翻译:Indus 合伙人约翰·平克尔 (John Pinkel) 表示，我们看到了“一些出口商和跨国公司以及与政府结盟的廉价企业（国有企业）的价值”，但他没有透露具体公司的名称。

The stock of PDD, which owns U.S.-based shopping app Temu, for example, is up 75%. Discount retailer Miniso (9896.HK) also has a global footprint and its shares are up 80% this year.翻译:例如，拥有美国购物应用 Temu 的拼多多 (PDD) 的股价上涨了 75%。折扣零售商名创优品（9896.HK）的足迹也遍布全球，今年其股价上涨了80%。

Global asset manager Invesco is overweight on Chinese assets in its Asian portfolios, and strategist David Chao highlighted the attractiveness of global expansion, citing the success of Japanese companies abroad while growth slowed at home.翻译:全球资产管理公司景顺(Invesco)在其亚洲投资组合中增持了中国资产，策略师赵大伟(David Chao)强调了全球扩张的吸引力，理由是日本公司在海外取得了成功，而国内增长却放缓了。

To be sure, there are bargain hunters.翻译:可以肯定的是，有一些讨价还价的人。

Wenli Zheng, a portfolio manager at T. Rowe Price, says shipmakers have record orderbooks and the timing is ideal to buy good but perceived economically sensitive companies that are trading cheaply, such as Kanzhun (2076.HK), a recruiter, or mall operator China Resources Mixc Lifestyle (1209.HK).翻译:T. Rowe Price的投资组合经理郑文丽表示，造船商的订单量创历史新高，现在是买入价格便宜但被认为对经济敏感的优质公司的理想时机，例如招聘公司或购物中心运营商看准（2076.HK）华润万象生活（1209.HK） 。

Jefferies said it has turned "tactically positive" on China given an appreciating yuan and cheap valuations, and LSEG data shows sellside analysts think Chinese firms will see their strongest earnings expansion in seven years in 2024.翻译:杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 表示，鉴于人民币升值和估值低廉，该公司已对中国采取“策略上的积极态度”，伦敦证交所 (LSEG) 数据显示， 卖方分析师认为，中国企业将在 2024 年实现七年来最强劲的盈利扩张。

Yet BofA Securities' November survey of 265 Asia fund managers found a majority are either waiting for improvement or looking elsewhere, suggesting no rush to add to their exposure to China.翻译:然而，美国银行证券公司 11 月份对 265 名亚洲基金经理的调查发现，大多数人要么等待改善，要么寻找其他地方，这表明他们并不急于增加在中国的投资。

($1 = 7.1872 yuan)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.1872 元)

Reporting by Summer Zhen; Additional reporting by Samuel Shen in Shanghai; Editing by Tom Westbrook and Tom Hogue翻译:夏震报道； Samuel Shen 在上海的补充报道；汤姆·威斯布鲁克和汤姆·霍格编辑

item.title: 英国谴责中国在南海针对菲律宾的事件
item.description:
Britain on Monday condemned what it called "unsafe and escalatory tactics deployed by Chinese vessels" against the Philippines over the weekend in the South China Sea.翻译:英国周一谴责了所谓的中国船只周末在南海针对菲律宾采取的“不安全且升级的策略”。

"The UK opposes any action which raises tensions, including harassment, unsafe conduct and intimidation tactics which increase the risk of miscalculation and threaten regional peace and stability," the foreign office said in a statement.翻译:英国外交部在一份声明中表示：“英国反对任何加剧紧张局势的行动，包括骚扰、不安全行为和恐吓策略，这些行为会增加误判风险并威胁地区和平与稳定。”

"Both China and the Philippines must adhere to the findings of the 2016 Arbitral Award proceedings, which are legally binding on both parties, it added.翻译:声明补充说：“中国和菲律宾都必须遵守2016年仲裁裁决程序的裁决，该裁决对双方都具有法律约束力。”

A spokesperson at the Chinese embassy in London said Beijing firmly opposes and strongly condemns the UK's "groundless accusations", and has lodged stern representations with the British side on this.翻译:中国驻伦敦使馆发言人表示，中方坚决反对并强烈谴责英方的“无端指责”，已就此向英方提出严正交涉。

"We urge the British side to respect China's territorial sovereignty and maritime rights and interests in the South China Sea, stop stirring up trouble and sowing discord," the remarks posted on the embassy website said.翻译:“我们敦促英方尊重中国在南海的领土主权和海洋权益，停止挑起事端、挑拨离间，”使馆网站上发布的言论称。

Reporting by Muvija M, and Liz Lee in Beijing; Editing by Andrew and Sandra Maler翻译:Muvija M 和 Liz Lee 北京报道；安德鲁·马勒和桑德拉·马勒编辑

item.title: 消息人士称，中国领导人开会讨论2024年的增长目标
item.description:
China's leaders started a closed-door meeting on Monday to discuss economic targets and map out stimulus plans for 2024, four sources familiar with the matter said.翻译:四位知情人士称，中国领导人周一召开闭门会议，讨论经济目标并制定 2024 年刺激计划。

The annual Central Economic Work Conference, during which President Xi Jinping and other top officials chart the course for the world's second-largest economy next year, is likely to end on Tuesday, the sources said.翻译:消息人士称，一年一度的中央经济工作会议可能于周二结束，习近平主席和其他高级官员将在会上为世界第二大经济体制定明年的发展方向。

Investors are closely watching for clues on next year's policy and reform agenda as China's economy has struggled to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery amid the deepening housing crisis, local government debt concerns, slowing global growth and geopolitical tensions.翻译:由于房地产危机加剧、地方政府债务担忧、全球经济增长放缓和地缘政治紧张局势，中国经济在疫情后难以实现强劲复苏，投资者正在密切关注明年政策和改革议程的线索。

The Politburo, a top decision-making body of the ruling Communist Party, said on Friday that fiscal policy would be moderately strengthened and will be "flexible, moderate, precise, and effective", to help spur the economic recovery.翻译:执政的共产党的最高决策机构政治局周五表示，财政政策将适度加强，将“灵活适度、精准有效”，以帮助刺激经济复苏。

A flurry of policy support measures have proven only modestly beneficial, raising pressure on authorities to roll out more stimulus.翻译:事实证明，一系列政策支持措施的效果有限，这加大了当局推出更多刺激措施的压力。

China's government advisers have told Reuters that they would recommend economic growth targets for 2024 ranging from 4.5% to 5.5%, with the majority favouring a target of around 5% - the same as this year.翻译:中国政府顾问告诉路透社，他们建议2024年的经济增长目标为4.5%至5.5%，其中大多数人赞成5%左右的目标——与今年相同。

"We are likely to set a growth target of around 5%," said a policy insider who spoke on condition of anonymity. "We need to step up policy support for the economy."翻译:“我们可能会设定5%左右的增长目标，”一位不愿透露姓名的政策内部人士表示。 “我们需要加大对经济的政策支持。”

China's state council, or cabinet, could not immediately be reached for comment outside business hours.翻译:在工作时间之外，未能立即联系到中国国务院置评。

Analysts at Citi expect China to set a fiscal deficit target of 3.8% of gross domestic product, or 3% of GDP on top of 1 trillion yuan ($139.32 billion) in special treasury bonds, and a special local government bond quota of 3.8 trillion yuan.翻译:花旗分析师预计，除了1万亿元人民币（1,393.2亿美元）的特别国债和3.8万亿元人民币的特别地方政府债券额度之外，中国还将设定财政赤字目标为国内生产总值的3.8%，即GDP的3% 。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan in sovereign bonds by the end of the year, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of gross domestic product (GDP) from the original 3%.翻译:10月，中国公布了年底前发行1万亿元人民币主权债券的计划，将2023年预算赤字目标从原来占国内生产总值(GDP)的3%提高到3.8%。

Although key economic targets are expected to be endorsed at the meeting, they will not be announced publicly until China's annual parliament meeting, usually held in March.翻译:尽管主要经济目标预计将在会议上获得通过，但要到通常在三月份举行的中国年度人大会议之前才会公开宣布。

Last week Ratings agency Moody's slapped a downgrade warning on China's credit rating, saying costs to bail out debt-laden local governments and state firms and control its property crisis would weigh on the growth outlook of the economy.翻译:上周，评级机构穆迪对中国信用评级发出下调警告，称救助负债累累的地方政府和国有企业以及控制房地产危机的成本将给经济增长前景带来压力。

China's growth is see on track to hit the government's target of around 5% this year.翻译:中国今年的经济增长有望实现政府设定的 5% 左右的目标。

($1 = 7.1775 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1775 人民币）

Reporting by Reuters staff; Editing by Alex Richardson翻译:路透社工作人员的报道；亚历克斯·理查森编辑

item.title: 韩国汽车电池公司与中国竞争对手展开较量，但仍心存疑虑
item.description:
Under pressure from clients eager to diversify away from China, South Korean makers of automotive batteries have pledged to develop a more affordable type of battery chemistry favoured by their Chinese rivals.翻译:在渴望实现业务多元化、远离中国的客户的压力下，韩国汽车电池制造商承诺开发一种更实惠的电池化学品，受到中国竞争对手的青睐。

But LG Energy Solution (LGES) (373220.KS), SK On and Samsung SDI (006400.KS) say it will be hard to go full steam ahead with lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries as they can't yet compete on price, executives and company officials familiar with their business strategies said.翻译:但 LG Energy Solution (LGES) (373220.KS) 、SK On 和三星 SDI (006400.KS)表示，很难全力推进磷酸铁锂 (LFP) 电池，因为它们尚无法在价格上竞争熟悉其业务战略的高管和公司官员表示。

Feeding their worries is slowing growth in electric vehicle sales and the potential for changes in U.S. subsidies should President Joe Biden lose the 2024 election, they said.翻译:他们表示，电动汽车销量增长放缓以及如果乔·拜登总统在 2024 年大选中落败，美国补贴可能会发生变化，这加剧了他们的担忧。

The firms - which until two years ago had solely pushed nickel-based lithium-ion batteries for electric vehicles - are also reluctant to undermine their efforts to develop cheaper nickel-based batteries, the sources added.翻译:消息人士补充说，这些公司直到两年前还只推出用于电动汽车的镍基锂离子电池，但也不愿意破坏他们开发更便宜的镍基电池的努力。

South Korean battery makers have long argued that nickel-based batteries are better due to greater energy density that provides longer driving ranges as well as being smaller and lighter.翻译:韩国电池制造商长期以来一直认为镍基电池更好，因为它具有更高的能量密度，可以提供更长的行驶里程，而且更小、更轻。

But global automakers are now pressuring them to develop LFP batteries, according to the sources.翻译:但据消息人士透露，全球汽车制造商现在正在向他们施压，要求他们开发磷酸铁锂电池。

"Our automotive customers have told us: 'We would like to buy batteries from your firm - LFP batteries for our smaller cars and nickel batteries for our more premium cars'," said an executive at a major Korean battery maker.翻译:“我们的汽车客户告诉我们：‘我们想从你们公司购买电池——为我们的小型汽车购买磷酸铁锂电池，为我们的更高档汽车购买镍电池’，”韩国一家主要电池制造商的高管表示。

Six battery industry sources spoke to Reuters for this article. They were not authorised to speak to media and declined to be identified.翻译:六位电池行业消息人士就本文接受了路透社采访。他们无权接受媒体采访并拒绝透露姓名。

The three firms said in statements to Reuters that they planned to build LFP batteries which are better than existing products, enhancing energy density and other features. Samsung SDI also said it plans to secure LFP cost competitiveness through product design and by improving processes and facilities.翻译:这三家公司在给路透社的声明中表示，他们计划生产比现有产品更好的磷酸铁锂电池，以提高能量密度和其他功能。三星SDI还表示，计划通过产品设计以及改进工艺和设施来确保LFP成本竞争力。

LFP batteries made by Chinese suppliers like CATL (300750.SZ) and BYD (002594.SZ) are roughly 20% cheaper than nickel counterparts, analysts say.翻译:分析师表示，CATL （300750.SZ）和比亚迪（002594.SZ）等中国供应商生产的磷酸铁锂电池比镍电池便宜约 20%。

Automakers are not only eager to cut costs, but those looking to sell in the United States want to take advantage of electric vehicle subsidies made available under the Biden administration's Inflation Reduction Act.翻译:汽车制造商不仅渴望削减成本，而且那些希望在美国销售的汽车制造商也希望利用拜登政府《通胀削减法案》提供的电动汽车补贴。

New U.S. rules, however, further limit the amount of Chinese content in batteries eligible for credits from next year, forcing automakers to pin their hopes on sourcing LFPs from non-Chinese suppliers.翻译:然而， 美国的新规定进一步限制了从明年起获得积分的电池中中国成分的含量，迫使汽车制造商将希望寄托在从非中国供应商那里采购磷酸铁锂。

For example, Ford Motor (F.N), which uses LFP batteries made by CATL in China in its Mustang Mach-E SUV, has said the model currently in dealer showrooms was unlikely to qualify for federal tax credits from January.翻译:例如，福特汽车(FN)在其野马 Mach-E SUV 中使用了宁德时代在中国生产的磷酸铁锂电池，该公司表示，目前在经销商展厅展示的这款车型从 1 月份开始不太可能有资格获得联邦税收抵免。

At present, none of the three major South Korean suppliers - which account for nearly half of global automotive battery supply excluding the Chinese market - make LFP automotive batteries. LGES does, however, manufacture other types of LFP batteries.

TALL ORDER

All three firms have recently said they are accelerating LFP development. LGES and Samsung SDI are targeting mass production in 2026, while SK On says it has completed development and is in talks with customers about commencing supply.翻译:这三家公司最近均表示正在加速 LFP 的开发。 LGES 和三星 SDI 的目标是在 2026 年实现量产，而 SK On 表示已经完成开发，正在与客户商谈开始供货事宜。

But matching their Chinese rivals in cost will be a tall order, the sources said.翻译:但消息人士称，在成本上赶上中国竞争对手将是一项艰巨的任务。

"While we are aware of the growing need for our own LFP battery production, we have to do it in a way that works for us and our clients, meaning we need to price LFP batteries competitively with Chinese products and we also need to make a profit," the executive at the major battery firm said.翻译:“虽然我们意识到对我们自己的磷酸铁锂电池生产的需求不断增长，但我们必须以一种对我们和我们的客户都有利的方式来生产磷酸铁锂电池，这意味着我们需要使磷酸铁锂电池的定价与中国产品具有竞争力，而且我们还需要制定利润，”这家大型电池公司的高管表示。

Building an LFP supply chain will take time. For a start, there are no makers of cathodes for LFP batteries in South Korea, so the three firms will have to source those cathodes from China.翻译:建立磷酸铁锂供应链需要时间。首先，韩国没有磷酸铁锂电池的阴极制造商，因此这三家公司将不得不从中国采购这些阴极。

Chung Wonsuk, an analyst at Hi Investment & Securities, estimates any Korean-made LFP batteries would likely be 17% more expensive than Chinese products and that could jump to 40% if the batteries were produced in the U.S. due to higher labour and infrastructure costs.翻译:Hi Investment & Securities 分析师 Chung Wonsuk 估计，任何韩国制造的 LFP 电池都可能比中国产品贵 17%，如果电池在美国生产，由于劳动力和基础设施成本更高，价格可能会跃升至 40% 。

Over the past year, the three South Korean battery firms have announced a combined $44 billion in investments to expand production capacity - mainly in the U.S. to qualify for subsidies.翻译:去年，韩国三大电池公司宣布总计投资 440 亿美元以扩大产能——主要是在美国以获得补贴。

Aggressively investing to build or retool plants for LFP production could be difficult in the next two to three years, the sources said, especially given slower EV sales that are partly due to a spike in auto financing costs for consumers.翻译:消息人士称，在未来两到三年内，积极投资建设或改造磷酸铁锂生产工厂可能会很困难，特别是考虑到电动汽车销售放缓，部分原因是消费者汽车融资成本飙升。

"We might not see blockbuster investment announcements like we have had in the past few years," said an executive at another Korean battery firm.翻译:另一家韩国电池公司的高管表示：“我们可能不会看到像过去几年那样的重磅投资公告。”

General Motors (GM.N), Ford and Tesla (TSLA.O), which all source batteries from South Korean firms, have recently said they will delay EV-related spending, citing slower sales.翻译:通用汽车(GM.N) 、福特和特斯拉(TSLA.O)均从韩国公司采购电池，最近均表示将推迟电动汽车相关支出，理由是销售放缓。

"Recently, automaker customers have slowed their battery orders to manage their EV inventories...this is the first time the battery sector has faced such a pause since the EV renaissance of the past few years," the first executive said.翻译:“最近，汽车制造商客户放慢了电池订单以管理电动汽车库存……这是自过去几年电动汽车复兴以来电池行业首次面临如此停顿，”第一位高管表示。

Korean battery makers are also conscious that Donald Trump, the leading Republican candidate in the upcoming U.S. presidential election, plans to sharply cut EV subsidies.翻译:韩国电池制造商还意识到，即将到来的美国总统大选中共和党领先候选人唐纳德·特朗普计划大幅削减电动汽车补贴。

"Making batteries in the U.S. doesn't really generate much profit in the first place," said Cho Hyunryul, a senior analyst at Samsung Securities.翻译:三星证券高级分析师 Cho Hyunryul 表示：“首先，在美国制造电池并不能真正产生太多利润。”

"If U.S. subsidies were significantly reduced, then South Korean battery makers might consider...diverting their resources to other regions."翻译:“如果美国的补贴大幅减少，那么韩国电池制造商可能会考虑……将资源转移到其他地区。”

Reporting by Heekyong Yang in Seoul; Additional reporting by Joe White in Detroit; Editing by Miyoung Kim and Edwina Gibbs翻译:Heekyong Yang 首尔报道；乔·怀特 (Joe White) 在底特律的补充报道；编辑：Miyoung Kim 和 Edwina Gibbs

item.title: 菲律宾称军事首领在被中国船只撞毁的船上
item.description:
Summary:
  • Manila accuses China of firing water cannons, ramming ship
  • Top Philippine military leader was aboard one ship
  • Marcos says China's actions illegal, violate international law
  • United States tells China to stop 'dangerous' conduct
翻译:概括：
  • 马尼拉指责中国发射水炮、冲撞船只
  • 菲律宾最高军事领导人登上一艘船
  • 马科斯称中国的行为非法，违反国际法
  • 美国要求中国停止“危险”行为

The Philippines on Monday called the actions of Chinese vessels against its boats carrying out South China Sea resupply missions over the weekend - including one with a senior Philippine military official aboard - a "serious escalation".翻译:菲律宾周一称，中国船只对周末执行南海补给任务的中国船只的行动——其中包括一艘载有菲律宾高级军事官员的船只——是“严重升级”。

Manila accused the Chinese coastguard and maritime militia of repeatedly firing water cannons at its resupply boats, causing "serious engine damage" to one, and "deliberately" ramming another. Philippine Chief of Staff of the Armed Forces Romeo Brawner said he was onboard a vessel that was both sprayed with a water cannon and rammed.翻译:马尼拉指责中国海岸警卫队和海上民兵多次向其补给船发射高压水枪，造成其中一艘补给船“严重发动机损坏”，并“故意”撞击另一艘补给船。菲律宾武装部队参谋长罗密欧·布劳纳表示，他所乘坐的船只遭到水炮喷射和撞击。

"This is a serious escalation on the part of the agents of the People's Republic of China," Jonathan Malaya, spokesperson of the National Security Council, said in a press conference where officials showed images and videos of the water cannons and ramming.翻译:国家安全委员会发言人乔纳森·马来亚在新闻发布会上表示，“这是中华人民共和国特工的严重升级”。会上，官员们展示了高压水枪和撞击的图像和视频。

Brawner told Philippine radio station DZBB that he was unhurt and that he did not believe China knew he was onboard the boat.翻译:布劳纳告诉菲律宾广播电台 DZBB，他没有受伤，而且他不相信中国知道他在船上。

The Philippines has filed diplomatic protests and has summoned China's ambassador over its "aggressive" actions in the South China Sea, which a foreign ministry official said were a "threat to peace, good order and security".翻译:菲律宾已就其在南海的“侵略”行为提出外交抗议，并召见了中国大使，一名外交部官员表示，这是“对和平、良好秩序与安全的威胁”。

China's foreign ministry said on Monday it had lodged solemn representations and a strong protest with the Philippine side over what it said was a collision on Sunday.翻译:中国外交部周一表示，已就周日发生的撞船事件向菲律宾方面提出严正交涉和强烈抗议。

The Philippine vessels "ignored Chinese coastguard's warnings and insisted on rushing into" waters near the Second Thomas Shoal, ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told a news briefing, adding that China's operation was "professional, reasonable and legal".翻译:外交部发言人毛宁在新闻发布会上表示，菲律宾船只“无视中国海警的警告，执意闯入”仁爱礁附近海域，并补充说中方的行动“专业、合理、合法”。

The Philippine ships were attempting to resupply military personnel stationed on a warship run aground years ago for use as a base.翻译:菲律宾船只正试图为多年前搁浅的一艘用作基地的军舰上的军事人员提供补给。

Mao said the responsibility for the "current repeated emergencies" at the disputed shoal lay with the Philippine side, which "refused to tow away the illegally beached warships and attempted to reinforce them to achieve permanent occupation".翻译:毛泽东表示，争议浅滩“目前反复出现的紧急情况”的责任在于菲律宾方面，“拒绝拖走非法搁浅的军舰，并试图增援它们以实现永久占领”。

China urged the Philippines to stop its "maritime violations and provocations" and stop its "groundless attacks and smears" against China, she said.翻译:中方敦促菲律宾停止“海上侵犯和挑衅”，停止对中国的“无端攻击和抹黑”。

Jay Batongbacal, a Manila-based expert on maritime law, said the latest incidents were "clearly another incremental escalation".翻译:马尼拉海事法专家杰伊·巴通巴卡尔 (Jay Batongbacal) 表示，最近的事件“显然是又一次逐步升级”。

"The use of water cannon this time is not mere dousing but had forceful impact, deliberately causing damage to vessels. And harassment of the civilian convoy is another step up in their threats," Batongbacal said.

'DISSONANCE'

It was not the first time China has used water cannons against Philippine vessels undertaking resupply missions for troops on features Manila occupies in the South China Sea; in August, the Philippines delayed a resupply mission by two weeks after its boats were sprayed.翻译:这并不是中国第一次对在菲律宾占领的南海岛礁上执行部队补给任务的菲律宾船只使用高压水枪； 8月，菲律宾因船只遭到喷洒而将补给任务推迟了两周。

The maritime confrontation between the Philippines and China during the weekend comes less than a month after leaders of both nations met on the sidelines of an economic summit in San Francisco to formulate ways forward in the South China Sea.翻译:菲律宾和中国周末发生海上对抗，距离两国领导人在旧金山举行的经济峰会期间会面，制定南海问题的解决方案不到一个月。

"There is a dissonance between what is being said and promised with what's happening in the waters," Foreign Ministry spokesperson Teresita Daza said in the briefing on Monday.翻译:外交部发言人特雷西塔·达扎在周一的简报中表示：“所说的和承诺的与水域中发生的情况不一致。”

Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. has increasingly complained about China's "aggressive" behaviour, and he has sought closer ties with its treaty ally the United States.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯越来越多地抱怨中国的“侵略性”行为，并寻求与其条约盟友美国建立更密切的关系。

China claims sovereignty over nearly the entire South China Sea, pointing to a line on its maps that cuts into the exclusive economic zones of Vietnam, the Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei and Indonesia. Taiwan, which China also claims as part of its territory, has said it does not accept Beijing's maps.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，并指出其地图上有一条线切入了越南、菲律宾、马来西亚、文莱和印度尼西亚的专属经济区。中国也声称台湾是其领土的一部分，台湾已表示不接受北京的地图。

The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said the line on China's maps has no legal basis, a ruling the United States supports, but Beijing rejects.翻译:2016年，常设仲裁法院表示，中国地图上的这条线没有法律依据，美国支持这一裁决，但北京拒绝。

The United States has called out China for interfering in the Philippines' maritime operations and undermining regional stability, and urged Beijing to stop "its dangerous and destabilising conduct" in the strategic waters.翻译:美国指责中国干涉菲律宾的海上行动并破坏地区稳定，并敦促北京停止在战略海域“ 危险和破坏稳定的行为” 。

It reaffirmed its commitment to the mutual defence pact between Washington and Manila, and called for stability after what it called China's "unsafe... operational behaviour," a Pentagon spokesperson said on Monday.翻译:五角大楼发言人周一表示，它重申了对华盛顿和马尼拉之间共同防御协定的承诺，并在称中国“不安全……行动行为”后呼吁稳定。

China's Mao said that the maritime disputes between China and the Philippines were an issue between the two countries and that "no third party has the right to intervene".翻译:中国毛泽东表示，中菲海上争端是两国之间的问题，“任何第三方无权干预”。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales and Mikhail Flores, and Liz Lee and Ethan Wang in Beijing; additional reporting by Susan Heavey in Washington; Editing by Kanupriya Kapoor and Gerry Doyle翻译:Neil Jerome Morales 和 Mikhail Flores 以及 Liz Lee 和 Ethan Wang 在北京的报道；苏珊·希维 (Susan Heavey) 在华盛顿的补充报道；卡努普里亚·卡普尔和格里·多伊尔编辑
item.author: Mikhail Flores, Karen Lema

item.title: 习近平访问期间，中国向越南提供铁路援助，推动数字丝绸之路
item.description:
China and Vietnam are set to agree this week on upgraded rail links and other infrastructure, possibly including digital projects, officials said, in moves that would bring Hanoi closer to Beijing as great powers jostle for influence in Vietnam.翻译:官员们表示，中国和越南将于本周就升级铁路和其他基础设施（可能包括数字项目）达成一致，此举将使河内与北京更加接近，因为大国都在争夺对越南的影响力。

The announcements are expected during President Xi Jinping's visit to Hanoi from Tuesday, the first in six years to the Southeast Asian neighbour, and shortly after U.S. President Joe Biden travelled to the Vietnamese capital in September to strengthen bilateral ties.翻译:预计这些消息将在习近平主席周二访问河内期间宣布，这是六年来首次访问这个东南亚邻国，也是在美国总统乔·拜登于 9 月访问越南首都以加强双边关系后不久。

China is ready to offer grants to Vietnam to boost the railway between Kunming and the Vietnamese port city of Haiphong, and other transport links from southern China to Hanoi, Vietnamese state paper Tuoi Tre reported, citing the Chinese ambassador to Vietnam Xiong Bo.翻译:越南官方报纸《Tuoi Tre》援引中国驻越南大使熊波的话说，中国准备向越南提供赠款，以加强昆明和越南港口城市海防之间的铁路建设，以及从中国南部到河内的其他交通联系。

He said China was ready to provide "non-refundable aid" for these projects, the paper reported late on Sunday, in an offer that, if confirmed, would represent a major concession to a country that is traditionally loath of taking loans.翻译:该报周日晚间报道称，他表示中国已准备好为这些项目提供“不可退还的援助”，这一提议如果得到确认，将是对一个传统上不愿接受贷款的国家的重大让步。

It is however unclear whether grants would come with loans and the share of both.翻译:然而，尚不清楚赠款是否会与贷款一起提供以及两者的份额。

A sizeable offer of grants could also be perceived as a blow to the United States and other Western backers of infrastructure projects in Vietnam, who under a climate plan have offered mostly loans at market values to help Vietnam reduce its coal use.翻译:提供大量赠款也可能被视为对美国和越南基础设施项目的其他西方支持者的打击，根据气候计划，这些国家主要以市场价值提供贷款，以帮助越南减少煤炭使用。

The Kunming-Haiphong rail upgrade plan, which Reuters first reported earlier in December, passes through the region where Vietnam has its biggest rare earths mines, which it has so far been unable to exploit because of a lack of processing technology.翻译:路透社12月初首次报道的昆明至海防铁路升级计划经过越南拥有最大稀土矿的地区，但由于缺乏加工技术，越南迄今为止无法开采该矿。

Vietnam is estimated to hold the world's second largest deposits of the strategic minerals which are at the moment crucial for electric vehicles and wind turbines.翻译:据估计，越南拥有世界第二大战略矿产资源，目前对电动汽车和风力涡轮机至关重要。

China is by far the world's biggest producer and refiner of rare earths, but is unclear what deal could be reached on that, as Beijing is usually reluctant to share its refining technology and Hanoi largely prevents export of unprocessed rare earths.翻译:中国是迄今为止世界上最大的稀土生产国和精炼国，但尚不清楚能就此达成什么协议，因为北京通常不愿分享其精炼技术，而河内则在很大程度上阻止未加工稀土的出口。

Vietnam's foreign affairs ministry did not reply on Monday to a request for comment about the possible grants, but Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh in November supported the upgrade of the Kunming-Haiphong rail.

DIGITAL SILK ROAD

China's ambassador also mentioned digital interconnections among the priorities to strengthen cooperation between the two countries, which are already enjoying booming economic exchanges.翻译:中国大使还提到，数字互联是两国加强合作的优先事项之一，两国经济交流已经蓬勃发展。

"Both of our countries need to enhance interconnections on land, sea, air and on the internet," Xiong Bo was reported saying.翻译:据报道，熊波表示：“我们两国都需要加强陆地、海洋、空中和互联网上的互联互通。”

Diplomats, officials and Vietnamese experts said digital interconnections meant including Vietnam in Chinese plans for a Digital Silk Road, Beijing's flagship programme under the wider Belt and Road Initiative focussed on optical fibre cables, data centres and other telecoms infrastructure in friendly countries.翻译:外交官、官员和越南专家表示，数字互联意味着将越南纳入中国的数字丝绸之路计划，这是北京在更广泛的“一带一路”倡议下的旗舰计划，重点关注友好国家的光纤电缆、数据中心和其他电信基础设施。

Additional submarine cables could be part of the discussion, one diplomat said, as Vietnam has experienced disruptions this year in its undersea digital infrastructure. Vietnam also plans to build a fully-fledged 5G network, an infrastructure in which China's telecom giant Huawei excels.翻译:一位外交官表示，由于越南今年的海底数字基础设施出现中断，因此可能会讨论增加海底电缆。越南还计划建设成熟的5G网络，这是中国电信巨头华为擅长的基础设施。

Vietnam's foreign ministry did not comment on Monday but President Vo Van Thuong at the Belt and Road forum in China in October urged to boost cooperation on digital infrastructure.翻译:越南外交部周一没有发表评论，但越南国家主席武文上在 10 月份中国“一带一路”论坛上敦促加强数字基础设施合作。

It is however unclear whether Vietnam is only paying lip service to that, as national security concerns tend to prevail on strategic projects, said Le Hong Hiep, a senior fellow at Singapore's Iseas–Yusof Ishak Institute, especially in the South China Sea, where Hanoi and Beijing disagree over borders.翻译:然而，新加坡尤索夫伊萨研究所高级研究员 Le Hong Hiep 表示，目前还不清楚越南是否只是口头上说说而已，因为国家安全问题往往在战略项目上占主导地位，特别是在南中国海，河内和北京在边界问题上存在分歧。

Reporting by Francesco Guarascio and Khanh Vu; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:Francesco Guarascio 和 Khanh Vu 的报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Francesco Guarascio, Khanh Vu

item.title: 香港“只有爱国者”选举表现平平，投票率创历史新低
item.description:
A "patriots only" district election in Hong Kong that barred opposition democrats from the ballot sheet amid a national security squeeze had a record low voter turnout of 27.5% as many voters spurned what was seen as an undemocratic poll.翻译:在国家安全压力下，香港举行的“仅限爱国者”区选举禁止反对派民主党人参与投票，投票率创历史新低，仅为 27.5%，因为许多选民拒绝接受被视为不民主的民意调查。

The sharp slide in turnout since the last such election in 2019 comes after Beijing imposed a sweeping national security law that has been used to clamp down on dissent, and overhauled the electoral system to shut out democrats and other liberals.翻译:自2019年上次此类选举以来，投票率大幅下滑，此前北京实施了一项全面的国家安全法，该法用于压制异见，并彻底改革了选举制度以将民主党人和其他自由派人士拒之门外。

"It can be seen that everyone has begun to feel that the election has no meaning," said Lemon Wong, one of the few remaining democrats still involved in local politics.翻译:“可以看出，每个人都开始觉得选举没有意义，”仅存的少数仍参与当地政治的民主党人之一莱蒙·黄(Lemon Wong)说。

"Even pro-establishment supporters are asking themselves why they need to vote because it's all the same."翻译:“即使是建制派的支持者也在问自己为什么需要投票，因为都是一样的。”

The previous lowest turnout was 35.8% in 1999. Four years ago at the last such election during Hong Kong's mass pro-democracy protests, a record 71% turnout brought about a landslide victory for the democratic camp in a fiercely contested poll.翻译:此前的最低投票率是1999年的35.8%。四年前，在香港大规模民主抗议期间的最后一次此类选举中，创纪录的71%投票率在一场激烈的民意调查中为民主阵营带来了压倒性胜利。

For this election, directly elected seats were slashed by nearly 80%, while all candidates were required to undergo national security background checks and secure nominations from two pro-government committees.翻译:这次选举，直选席位被削减近80%，所有候选人都必须接受国家安全背景调查，并获得两个亲政府委员会的提名。

At least three pro-democracy and non pro-establishment groups, including moderates, and even some pro-Beijing figures failed to meet those thresholds.翻译:至少三个亲民主和非建制派团体，包括温和派，甚至一些亲北京人士未能达到这些门槛。

An unprecedented electronic poll register system failure caused some disruptions and an eventual switch to a manual system, with polling times extended by 90 minutes till midnight.翻译:前所未有的电子投票登记系统故障造成了一些干扰，最终切换到手动系统，投票时间延长了 90 分钟，直到午夜。

The electoral commission said the extension wasn't linked at all to the turnout rate.翻译:选举委员会表示，延期与投票率完全无关。

Security was tight, with over ten thousand police deployed. At least six people were arrested for alleged offences including posting online for people to cast invalid ballots, or to incite others to disrupt the polls, according to statements from the police and the city's anti-corruption authority.

"BIRDCAGE" ELECTION

Three members of the "League of Social Democrats" were among those followed and arrested just before they planned to protest against what they described as a "birdcage election" and a "big leap backwards" for electoral and democratic rights.翻译:“社会民主党联盟”的三名成员在计划抗议他们所说的“鸟笼选举”以及选举和民主权利的“大倒退”之前遭到跟踪和逮捕。

The police said in a statement the three were arrested on suspicion of attempting to "incite others" to disrupt the poll.翻译:警方在一份声明中表示，三人因涉嫌试图“煽动他人”扰乱投票而被捕。

Hong Kong's leader John Lee, who had sought in recent weeks to rally public support for the polls, again defended their legitimacy given a need to secure stability in Hong Kong that returned from British to Chinese rule in 1997.翻译:香港领导人李家超最近几周一直在寻求争取公众对这次民意调查的支持，鉴于需要确保1997年从英国回归中国统治的香港的稳定，他再次捍卫了民意调查的合法性。

"It is the last piece of the puzzle for us to implement the principles of patriots governing Hong Kong," Lee said after casting his vote. He added that the 2019 election had been used to sabotage governance and endanger national security.翻译:李在投票后表示：“这是我们落实爱国者治港原则的最后一块拼图。”他补充说，2019 年选举被用来破坏治理并危害国家安全。

While some western governments have been critical of Hong Kong's authoritarian turn under the national security law, China says it has brought stability to the financial hub after protracted pro-democracy protests in 2019.翻译:尽管一些西方政府一直批评香港根据国家安全法转向独裁，但中国表示，在 2019 年旷日持久的民主抗议活动之后，该法为这个金融中心带来了稳定。
